posts.title: 莫比乌斯反演入门
posts.text: 终于开写自己的第一篇博客了qaq总结一下简单的莫比乌斯吧立个flag明天搞杜教筛 \sum_{i=1}^n a_i=0$\sum_{i=1}^n a$莫比乌斯反演入门讲解 莫比乌斯反演的两种形式： 若 $F(n)=\sum_{d|n}f(n)$ 则 $f(n)=\sum_{d|n}\mu(d)F(\frac{n}{d})$ 若 $F(n)=\sum_{n|d}f(n)$ 则 $f(n)=\sum_{n|d}\mu(\frac{d}{n})F(d)$ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;#define int __int128int gcd(int x, int y) { if (y == 0)return x; return gcd(y, x % y);}int egcd(int a, int b, int &x, int &y) { if (b == 0) { x = 1, y = 0; return a; } int p = egcd(b, a % b, y, x); y -= a / b * x; return p;}int k, n, m[15], b[15],b1, b2, m1, m2, d, p, x, y, b3, m3;bool uni(int i){ d = gcd(m1, m2); if ((b1 - b2) % d) return false; egcd(m1 / d, m2 / d, x, y); b3 = b1 + m1 * (b2 - b1) / d * x, m3 = m1 * m2 / d; b[i] = (b3 % m3 + m3) % m3, m[i] = m3; return true;}signed main(){ long long temp; cin >> temp; int k = temp; for (int i = 1; i <= k; i ++) { cin >> temp, m[i] = temp; cin >> temp, b[i] = temp; b[i] = (b[i] % m[i] + m[i]) % m[i]; } // for (int i = 1; i <= k; i ++) cout << (long long)b[i] << endl; for (int i = 2; i <= k; i ++) { b1 = b[i - 1], b2 = b[i], m1 = m[i - 1], m2 = m[i]; if (!uni(i)) { cout << "Tankernb!" << endl; return 0; } long long tt = b[i], mm = m[i]; // cout << tt << " " << mm << endl; } n = (b[k] % m[k] + m[k]) % m[k]; // long long tt = n, mm = m[k]; // cout << tt << " " << mm << endl; // cin >> temp; n = temp; if (n <= 3) { cout << "Lbnb!" << endl; return 0; } int f1 = 1, f2 = 1, f3; while (f2 < n) { f3 = f1 + f2; f1 = f2, f2 = f3; } if (f3 == n) cout << "Lbnb!" << endl; else cout << "Zgxnb!" << endl;}
posts.excerpt: 终于开写自己的第一篇博客了qaq总结一下简单的莫比乌斯吧立个flag明天搞杜教筛
